article_title: Hezbollah, Israel and the Golan Heights: What is happening and why?
sentence: Hezbollah  supports  Hamas,  which  has  been  at  war  with  Israel  since  7  October,  when  Hamas  gunmen  launched  an  unprecedented  attack  on  Israel,  killing  about  1,200  people  and  taking  251  others  back  to  Gaza  as  hostages.
